TextData.SourceString:
Knife for butchering summoned Pals.
When equipped, the Pet command becomes Butcher.
Butchered Pals will not return.

TextData.SourceString:
A small food storage.
When you assign an Ice Pal to it, the food inside becomes less likely to spoil.

A small food storage.

A large food storage.

TextData.SourceString:
You can command your Pals to work on various things inside a base.
Try not to overwork them!

TextData.SourceString:
Farm for raising sheep-and fowl-like Pals.
Assign a Pal with the appropriate traits to a farm
to automatically produce items.
